testcase.classname: Add a new record and another record ,and then delete the first record
testcase.name: TC01-User should add a new Record
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the application_login page with the LoginPage_URL..........passed When User enters the UserName on the login page.............................passed And User enters the UserPassword on the login page..........................passed And User clicks the Login_button on the login page..........................passed And User clicks the Modules_button on the Home page.........................passed And User hovers over the Environment........................................passed And User hovers over and clicks the Air_Emissions...........................passed When User clicks New_Record_button on the Air_Emissions page................passed And User fills in the Sample_Date field with "10102020".....................passed And User fills in the Description field with "The First SHE software description should not be seen".passed And User clicks Save&Close_button...........................................passed And User is on the AIR_Emissions Page.......................................passed When User clicks New_Record_button on the Air_Emissions page................passed And User fills in the Sample_Date field with "20022020".....................passed And User fills in the Description field with "The Second SHE software description seen".passed And User clicks Save&Close_button...........................................passed When User clicks Manage_Record of the First Record on the Air_Emissions page.passed And User selects and clicks the delete button...............................passed Then User verifies the First Record has been deleted........................passed And User clicks Log_out button..............................................passed
